cast.name: 阿比盖尔·塔尔泰林 Abigail Tarttelin
阿米利亚·泰勒 Amelia Tyler

introduction: Rebecca is a disgraced scientists carrying out illegal experiments to confirm the existence and begin travel between parallel universes.She accidentally cracks the problem. Her counterparts in neighboring universes are also working on the same problem but they but they have their own agendas and things get out of hand.Three-parallel universes collide when a scientist, Rebecca Hunter, conducts an illegal experiment in time travel. She soon discovers three doors are now open to parallel universes - present day, past, and a totalitarian nation in an unknown timeline. As her evil fascist self tries to kill her to invade the other universes with an army, the multi-verse begins to unravel. Rebecca must use her sharp intellect and mastery of quantum physics to save the multi-verse.
